item.title: NFT misconception: JPEG aren't on the Blockchain
item.description: Today’s biggest miscconcepions about NFTs is that they’re “jpeg” image stored on the Ethereum blockchain, it’s not. Probably because those digital art can be easy to vizualize, and famous artists attempt today to sell their digital art as an NFT on platform such as Opensea, it has gained lot of attentions this past months. Artists starts creating their on a piece of paper, then their computer. But when you buy an NFT, what makes you the owner of it?
